website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, easy-to-use blackhead removal method that's highly effective and inexpensive. However, it's limited for use on the nose.
pros: Deep-cleaning strips that work by peeling away blackheads and skin impurities
Work great for most customers when used as directed
Designed to fit over the nose, which is a common stop for blackheads to develop
You get 30 strips for a low price
cons: Not intended to be used around the eyes
Likely to irritate skin if you use them too often - no more than 3 times per week recommended

customer_reviews.title: Get these, don't get biore
customer_reviews.text: I don't review things unless they blow my expectations. This far exceeded what I was expecting. I have used biore strips the past 10 years and thought those were the norm. Being deployed can be tough on my skin and pores with the constant dust and sand. I normally have very dirty pores but it's gotten worse since being here. I went for a run in 110 degrees with 90% humidity and exfoliated right after. I immediately put the strip on, let it dry for 15 mins, and was astonished by how much came out. My nose has never felt this smooth. You can see my pictures and judge for yourself how well these worked. Get these, don't get biore.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Tam

customer_reviews.title: Must have! Amazing! Better than Biore
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! It's somewhat like biore, but better and more pure gunk extraction. I followed the instructions but after putting the strip on my wet nose, I also patted it with wet fingers to increase the moisture and sticking power. After 10-15 mins this lil strip pulled out the gunk and it felt refreshing. I think the strips have a menthol or astringent additive because it felt awesome! I'd post a pic but I think lots of reviewers have shown what these awesome strips can do. Also there are so many in a package! This far surpasses biore and their "sample" pack. Will buy again once I get close to running out of these.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Burgess

customer_reviews.title: I didn't get an allergic reaction!
customer_reviews.text: I have THE most sensitive skin of anyone I know. I can't use any fragrance products and especially no face lotions, cleaners or makeup without getting a face rash. I read this one carefully and was a bit hesitant about the witch hazel but I didn't have one bit of rash after use. And it works! So, happy faces all around.
customer_reviews.author: Girl #236

customer_reviews.title: make sure its wet
customer_reviews.text: its a really good deal, its better if you wash your face with some pretty warm water, and before placing the strip on your face i like to bend it a little kind of crack it a bit and then place it on my face, then after its on i like to get a towel with warm water and just put it over the strip and make sure its not dry. after that it will take out all the gunk that was in your pores! i will keep buying these, much better deal than the biore strips (which i would only buy before) and works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lyd

customer_reviews.title: Did not work...
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand all these great wonderful reviews that turn me to but this product. It did not work. I could have done a better job with duck tape. I followed the direction to the T. All it did was pull out the peach fuss on my face and nose. (I was looking for a product that would NOT pull out hair) I have deep large pores so there is plenty of blackheads for the strips to grab a hold of. Also, It was uncomfortable pulling off, so it is not painless either. Edit: BTW I have been receiving emails from seller asking me to take down my comment. Very deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: A++++, yes girl!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg!! These are incredible!! Move over, Biore!! These are bomb!! Easy to use, comfortable, and effective! Cleared my pores right out! TIP: I left it on for 25 minutes and pulled the strip off at an UPRIGHT angle.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of these. I put them on and didn’t expect much, but I set a 15 min timer to make sure i left them on for the recommended time. Even when it was ready to remove, it didn’t feel too “attached.” But I was WRONG. My pores are *now* clean, and these work amazing! I’ve used on my nose and my chin with great results. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: E Neal

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Blackheads!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I'm not a fan of these kinds of strips because I never felt like they really got down and dirty...and then this came into my life. I have a magnified bathroom mirror (10x, so you can see everything) and every time I use one strip, I take a before and after look. These strips are SO much more affordable than the well-known name brands and these are also 100x more effective. Try this!
customer_reviews.author: ongleehinakan

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging but effective product
customer_reviews.text: The box that contains the strips fell apart during shipment but that is more of a presentation issue. Overall, these strips actually surprised me... I usually used Biore strips and was a little doubtful at first when putting on the strip because it is stiffer and therefore harder to contour around my nose. However, it was worth the time trying to smooth out the bubbles and limit the creases. Honestly, these strips pulled far more gunk out than the Biore strips. Definitely will be using these from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Orino

customer_reviews.title: Foul Odor - Heavy Chemical Plastic Vinyl Smell
customer_reviews.text: I doubt these are safe. Sketchy info on box and the stench versus a Biore is unbearable. I immediately took it off and threw away the box. Going back to Biore. Thought this might be a better deal but these feel like a health hazard.
customer_reviews.author: CJL

customer_reviews.title: Better than Biore, that's for sure.
customer_reviews.text: These worked amazing! It didn't get everything but it got a ton and actually did what was promised. Biore pore strips never worked for me but these worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy it. These do not work. I opened one of the strips and it wasn’t even stuck to the plastic. It was completely dry. I still tried it anyways thinking it might stick after I wet my face. Nope. Didn’t stick. I opened more of the strips thinking I might’ve just pulled a bad one. Every single one of them is that way. Not sure how this has so many good reviews. Don’t waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Vu

customer_reviews.title: Seller?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered "Blackhead Pore Strips, Blackhead Remover Deep Cleansing Pore Strips For Nose, 30 strips, Hypo Allergenic and Oil Free"  I received "Blackhead Remover Pore Strips For Men, Deep Cleansing Strips, 29 Strips, With Charcoal and Oil Free"  The men version has one less strip AND is a dollar cheaper. I don't know why I didn't receive the version I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Heber Jairo Lopez Zalba

customer_reviews.title: I don't know about this
customer_reviews.text: This really smells like you should not put this on your skin. But I did anyway. Then it made me break out. I knew better while I was doing it and then I really paid for it - in chin pimples. Never happens with the real Biore strips. But the Biore strips from amazon aren't real, so I took myself to CVS to get the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: EmGal

customer_reviews.title: Rips off your skin, not your blackheads 😡
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little confused by all these rave reviews on here... basically these strips ripped off the top layer of my skin but somehow managed to leave all my blackheads still in my pores. I used it last night and now the skin around my nose where the strip was is bright red and stings like all hell, I couldn’t even put makeup on today. Also, I don’t have overly sensitive skin either so this shouldn’t have happened. I used them exactly as directed by the box. Not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ALMY E.

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I dont know These smell odd like chemicals. They’re not like biore. I feel like there the cheap foreign version. I won’t use them.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Nappa

customer_reviews.title: Nose gunk be gone!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using pore strips off and on since my teens and gross as it may be, I love that satisfying look at the pore strip when it's removed to see what gunk it removed from my nose! My skin is really clear buy I get those little clogged pores on my nose and they drive me crazy. These are so easy to use! You just splash some water on your nose, apply the pore strip, let it dry for 7-15 min and pull it up. I like to start at each edge at the same time and work my way in when removing it. It's amazing how well these clear out your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: These deliver on their promise
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to try applying a warm washcloth on top of the strip after applying and leave it for 25 minutes. They remove the gunk in your pores. The very sides of your nose that connect to your face will still require extra attention. I have to squeeze the crease to unclog the pores. These are addicting and I wish one use would last a week but in days I’m in need for another round. I wash my face twice a day religiously with a salicylic acid retinol cleanser but these are still necessary for the routine. The adhesive has an odor but it fades quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was blown away by the price of these pore strips - 30 strips for less than $12?!! Anyone who has purchased pore strips before knows this is a great deal. I purchased these for my teenage daughter and was skeptical at first because they were so cheap....but they actually do a great job! She was impressed with how nicely the strip came off and how much was actually removed using the strip. She also noticed her skin was a lot smoother after using the strip. I highly recommend giving these a shot if you have blackhead problem areas!
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN

customer_reviews.title: Better than Biore
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent! I was skeptical when purchasing, despite the good reviews. But I was pleasantly impressed! They don’t get everything, but they pull out A LOT of gunk!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Nauck

customer_reviews.title: Great results!
customer_reviews.text: Boy do these work! I use them once a week and really saturate my nose w water In order to crest good adhesion. Then I dab one or two small dabs of a damp Hand towel on top of the strip to make sure it seals. I love seeing all the dirt come out! Once the strip is off and I’ve washed off the remaining glue (if any) I top it off with a thin layer of Onexatron from my dermatologist and I have a super clean nose :)
customer_reviews.author: Laura T.

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Similar effects to Biore, but not as expensive. I washed my face with warm water before putting on the pore strip and removed it after 15 minutes. It works! I saw all the blackheads it removed on the strip. I have relatively sensitive skin, but these didn’t irritate my skin at all. I would definitely be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: PREPARE TO BE SATISFIED IN WAYS YOU NEVER THOUGHT POSSIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I excavated an entire ancient civilization from my boyfriends nose. Multiple times. It was fantastic. He said his pores were too tight! He said it wouldn't do anything!!! But this brand is like none I've ever seen! I've also given some of these pore strips to my friends. The above picture is my friends pore strip. We had a contest, and she won. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Alisse

customer_reviews.title: It’s not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this. Reading the reviews I thought it all good.
customer_reviews.author: Elvie Bagwell

customer_reviews.title: Satisfying blackhead removal
customer_reviews.text: This item is basically like a value pack of bioreStrips! It comes with 30 which is a pretty good deal for the price. I just tried out a strip on myself and it definitely took out some blackheads! I love the feeling of peeling off the nose strip it’s so satisfying. I left it on for only 10 minutes and seen results! I would recommend holding a warm wet cloth to your nose prior to using the strip for a more effective use! My nose feels and looks good. I’m satisfied with this product! I would say I would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla R

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.. Works!
customer_reviews.text: Great pore strips. Easy to use, stuck on right away to my wet nose. Took about 15-20 min to feel dry. Definitly made me tear up pulling this off, however it did definitly get some gunk out of my nose! It did not get everything, but I was prety impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Will be purchasing again! Better results than competition.
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this product a 4 instead of a five because the strips are a little stiffer than biore strips which is what I was using before. I very lightly flex the strip while it's on the plastic and that helps get a better adhesion to all the creases of my nose. Once it adheres it sticks well and when pulling off there is resistance (which is what you want) but it doesn't hurt to peel. I recommend peeling the strips straight (90° angle) and slowly. The quantity to price ratio is awesome as well. My husband and I both can use these and get results. The biore strips would only get a little of my husband's black heads.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Don't work well, no replacement for Biore
customer_reviews.text: These are nowhere near as good as biore. They smell really bad, which is especially terrible since you're supposed to put them on your nose. They're also really stiff, so it's hard to place them. They also take much longer to dry than Biore.
customer_reviews.author: FeedbackfromCali

customer_reviews.title: Effective, simple to use & affordable.
customer_reviews.text: This product was awesome! Definitely did clean my pores. I couldn’t believe the amount of blackheads that this little strip pulled out of my nose! It was easy to use, the instructions were simple to follow & it was extremely effective! I will be using every single strip in the box for sure! I’m impressed as most strips i e tried before don’t work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather DeLanoy

customer_reviews.title: Great amount of strips for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I got so many for the price! I can’t believe I never thought about buying these on Amazon before COVID-19. I get More for my money, which takes the guilt out of using them more frequently. This is been better for my skin. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Overall feel good
customer_reviews.text: When I received the mask, I thought it was a thick letter. The packaging is very exquisite, the store is very considerate, and an instruction manual for the nose patch is included. Use according to the instructions. The first step really shows a lot of white spots, and there are a lot of essence. The first time I use the second step, the water is a little bit less, and the sticking is not very good. The second time is very effective. Many blackheads hurt a little when they are torn off and need to be lighter. It is important to shrink pores. Overall feel good
customer_reviews.author: Charissa Boutsikaris

customer_reviews.title: They Smell Awful!
customer_reviews.text: These did not adhere as well as Biore, nor did they remove as much. Mostly, I could not get past the awful glue chemical smell while they were on. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: KVioletta

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: They don’t work at all they just stick to your face really firmly and you think they will remove the blackheads but after 3 tries on different days they don’t do a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Just as effective as Biore BUT CHEAPER
customer_reviews.text: My experience with this product has been great. I've used these 4 times so far, and in the past I've always used the Biore ones (the normal kind). These seem to perform just as well as Biore at a lower cost. Thanks for the cheap and effective product!
customer_reviews.author: Seth K.

customer_reviews.title: Unclogged my pores
customer_reviews.text: Love these! they are so much cheaper then biore and there’s So many in 1 pack. I have larger pores on my nose and needed these to help get rid of my clogged pores and help my skin look better. Definitely recommend. I even got my boyfriend hooked on these.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: It's decent
customer_reviews.text: This nose strip does not work as well as others that I have tried. It does adhere however it doesn't clean as well compared to the others I have tried and it has a very strong smell to it but the smell dissipates after a while. Overall it does an okay job.
customer_reviews.author: Mint

customer_reviews.title: Better bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness! A pote strip that’s the same price for 30 as the big label ones are for 7. Both my husband and I use them. My husband used one last night after going weeks without (he uses a cpap machine for sleep so his pores clog something awful). He loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Marrazzo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for this product because of the good reviews & the fact that this is a large pack of pore strips. Unfortunately, the smell of the strips is terrible & it doesn't really get stiff or take out that many blackheads. It seems to only get stiff & take out blackheads on the side of my nose only. I'm not impressed with this product at all and will go back to using the strips I get at CVS
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Get all the gunk out of your pores!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Biore strips before & hated how they sometimes didn’t adhere very well to the skin when pulling off my nose, so thought I’d give these a try. They adhered great to my skin; when I peeled the strip off my nose, whatever was stuck in my pores was right there on the strip. I honestly was really surprised they worked as well as they did. Glad I found these because they really do work!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Minimal removal
customer_reviews.text: These stick on well to the face, however I haven’t noticed them successfully removing as much as I would like. I’ve been through at least half the box since I’ve purchased them. I feel they work okay, but not great. Probably will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: These work just okay, nothing crazy for me personally. There was a very very strong chemical odor when you first open the strip. The strip itself wasn’t very sticky so I had to spray water AFTER it was on as well to help it adhere. Overall, it was just okay. It’s cheaper but you’re definitely getting what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow, they really pack 30 in there! These are just as good if not better than the other main brand that offers these. I will never go back to the expensive ones you buy at the store. These are even better, get more out, and you get so many more in a box! Zero complains. Sold customer.
customer_reviews.author: D'Arcy S.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy
customer_reviews.text: These are so simple and easy to use! I could visibly see a difference. They are also super cost efficient! Great value item! I notice with wearing a mask all the time I break out all the time and I just need some extra care!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey King

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMEND these blackhead remover strips. No pain! Easy to remove
customer_reviews.text: These blackhead pore strips help me a lot to remove these disgusting blackhead pores. No pain at all in the moment of removing. Very easy to use. It's just a pleasure using them and seeing results. Affordable price. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TATIANA

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy! Price is indicative of their functionality!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these! At first glance, the reviews are generally good and the price is cheap. However, I genuinely don't understand how these work for people! Every time I've ripped them off after 15 minutes, literally no black heads had been removed! Super frustrating! Please spend a bit more money for a product that will actually work!
customer_reviews.author: Blaise Siefer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Loved getting to try pore strips again. You just need to wash and wet your skin so that these strips adhere, 15 minutes, then bam! I didn’t get the pleasure of seeing pretty much anything come out on the pore myself, but I guess I’m lucky and shouldn’t complain! : )
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Pore strips are amazing and peeled all stuff of my nose and has very good quality! Good product and very sticky. Great product. Good stretch and thickness with nose and peels all oil off.
customer_reviews.author: david patel

customer_reviews.title: Beat strips I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a FULL box of strips, so many. And they are very stiff and rigid, and VERY sticky. Sometimes because of the stiffness I like to gently pat them upon application with a damp wash cloth to help kind of soften and form it to my nose. But once it’s on there! It gets the most results for me, consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Pore strips work fine
customer_reviews.text: These pore strips do the job. Wet your nose well, press one on and let it dry fully (about 15 mins), then peel off. My nose area looks and feels much cleaner and smoother.
customer_reviews.author: kps27

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do anything
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use and stick to your face, but they don’t pull anything out of your pores... which is the point. They also smell really chemically and it kinda burns my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: So far this looks like a major thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my teens. They absolutely loved them and both committed to making sure they use them daily for the next few weeks. Hopefully this product will help them both. It appears to be good quality and design.
customer_reviews.author: Tebs

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Great product because it does the job! Be sure to wet your nose before you apply and wet the top of the strip once its on, sort of like a temporary tattoo. That’s how to get full use of this product!
customer_reviews.author: reviewerbaby0505

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: First off, I love that there are 30 of these for the price. I don’t have bad pores on my nose and these suckers GOT EVERYTHING out. Highly recommend getting these. The only odd thing about them is they did have a slight smell, but they smelled like mint so it wasn’t unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: drake

customer_reviews.title: No one should put this on their skin!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely terrible! The adhesive smells like the adhesive on envelopes that you lick. When I peeled it off it hurt for days! It felt and looked like I had chemical burn and it actually TORE MY SKIN! And... it didn’t even remove what it was supposed to! So it didn’t work AND damaged my skin. No one should use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarnold

customer_reviews.title: so so, inferior to more expensive brand (Biore)
customer_reviews.text: The strips have less adhesive power than Biore and you need to wet them really well and keep them on a long time (1/2 hr) before taking them off; even so, they don't remove dirt from pores very well, I'd say 60% compared to Biore.
customer_reviews.author: Margherita P.

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: I’m so shocked that everyone gave these 5 stars. Horrible chemical smell and gave me a rash. I don’t even have sensitive skin. I’ll stick with biore. And they didn’t even work. I would give this zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: adnama

customer_reviews.title: A steal
customer_reviews.text: Biore is so terribly expensive. While these a slightly less effective than Biore, they work quite well and are a bargain!
customer_reviews.author: zenner

customer_reviews.title: Quality versus Odor
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to change it up from the Biorè strips I usually use. Thse strips do work well but be forewarned they have a strong chemical/glue smell to them. If you have a sensitive nose these are definitely not for you. Like I said, they work well and they cover more surface of the nose area and they do stick well but the smell can be a challenge to get used to. Would I repurchase? Probably not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than store brands
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised at how well these removed my pores compared to store brands. These are the only ones I ever had work.
customer_reviews.author: MQ

customer_reviews.title: these are okay :(
customer_reviews.text: I would rate them better, but the smell is not pleasant :(. I actually purchased a different kind and am surprised that they have a nice pleasant smell to them :)
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Nose strip cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This strip does clean your pores so you don’t feel like you need to squeeze them out. Use after you shower when your pores are open. My face feels so clean afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work all I was left with glue on my face
customer_reviews.author: JenifferR

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I love that they actually work and they are plenty. Way better than biore . You can obviously see the difference in quality but it full filled its purpose and for a better price
customer_reviews.author: Regina Urdapilleta

customer_reviews.title: Great Strips for Value
customer_reviews.text: Overall these work better than any other strips I have bought and the price is right. The only thing I would warn is to make sure your nose is dry patch free before using. My first time using I had a dry patch and the skin ripped off with the strip. Ouch...but that's because these really work. My nose is the clearest it's been of blackheads in years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They’re okay
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. I’m still Using them and observing for effectiveness. They work, but maybe not as effective as others. I’ll say yes they stick to your nose and chin, but the outer part of the strip on the sides doesn’t stick super well. It hangs off a little. My bf has a large nose and the strip didn’t stick on his whole nose.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Silva

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that these did nothing to remove the blackheads and gunt as promised. I used them several times and was very dissatisfied. They are a lot more expensive than others I've purchased. I will be going back to the 'original' Biore strips they work the best.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do anything
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to help extract nasties from my nose and chin area but did a whole bunch of nothing and cause me pain when I pulled it off to examine
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: Overrated In my opinion
customer_reviews.text: These just aren’t for me. The cost and quantity is great, but I didn’t feel like they were better than competitors and close to half of them were difficult to get off the plastic. Will not be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Legit 👌👌👌
customer_reviews.text: I love how this product takes all the whiteheads from my nose every time i used it... I used a lot of nose strip before but I'm sticking to this one now...
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bibat

customer_reviews.title: Great but can be painful
customer_reviews.text: These are great strips for what we are looking for and did the job, but warning - the adhesion was so strong that they did cause my husband's skin to slightly rip when he pulled it off after the alotted time was done.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie B.

customer_reviews.title: be careful!
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to try this and The product itself works well and really clears pores out but there definitely should be a warning because it ripped my actual skin out and left it bleeding :(
customer_reviews.author: belinda adey

customer_reviews.title: just feels like you are peeling your skin off
customer_reviews.text: works as a peel off mask but no blackheads or anything would come on to the patch
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Hrnyak

customer_reviews.title: Okay pore strip, but some packages were empty
customer_reviews.text: Product is okay, comparable to Biore. But a bunch of the packets I got had nothing in them! Open it up and no strip, what the heck lol.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the main competition. They are stiff and kind of thick, so I wasn't sure how well they would stick but I've used half a dozen and each strip has pulled out a ton of gunk.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for the price, but does not have strong pull.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and sticks well, but does not extract as much matter from the pores as other nasal strips I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these to work and they had such great reviews, but my husband didn’t see a difference after using multiple times. Maybe just not for every skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Schuky

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: Lord Jesus, I've never smelled pore strips that smell this bad! They also didn't remove any Gunk from my pores, so I'm not sure if they work.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna H

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried these twice now and so far they work really well! Cleared my pores without any pain or irritation. I dont see myself going back to biore again, I will be sticking with these from now on! Only difference I found was that the feel a little crinkly until they get wet but its not a negative or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: different item received
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this because it looked like the most reasonable price for a good amount of strips. however i didn’t receive the strips in the picture, the strips i got said it was for men and was a charcoal black pore strip vs what the image shows.
customer_reviews.author: caesarea maya

customer_reviews.title: Great job!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I’ve used the biore strips before however they were way to expensive. These stripes are very affordable with 30 pcs a pack and gets the work done. I like the use products without too many complicated ingredients and the ingredients on these strips are very simple. I would recommend this product over biore.
customer_reviews.author: Jtc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality- smooth clear skin!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. The packaging is simple with clear directions, and each strip is easy to open and apply. I left mine on for 15 minutes and it worked great! You could see the results on the strip and my skin looked clear and smooth. Definitely a must have beauty product!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Eck

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: While these do work really well, I have tried to use it several different times, and it literally rips the skin off your nose. I've been using pore strips my entire life, and these are the first ones to actually make an entire section of my nose bleed. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: terrible product
customer_reviews.text: These straps don't work at all. I tried the first time and thought I did something wrong. When I tried again I left it on for a lot longer and still nothing don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: hollylynne24

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not usually for the pore strips. I have used biore before but I can’t say I was too enthused by them. I love that these have the slits for a better fit. I was surprised by how effective these were they work really great! Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money
customer_reviews.text: So so easy to use and adheres to the skin that it really felt clean after using this product! Love how it cleans and no room for clogged pores.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby C

customer_reviews.title: Great pore strips!
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot. They're very well made. Takes crap out of pores.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Wallace-Osburn

customer_reviews.title: I'll buy it again after I use it. Farewell to Heitou's troubles
customer_reviews.text: It's very mild, and there won't be any allergy. After a try, it feels good. It really sticks a lot of dirty things down. In an instant, you will feel that the hair follicles are much cleaner and don't hurt the skin. It's easy to use. I love it. I'll buy it again after I use it. satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Works really good
customer_reviews.text: These worked better than biore or target brand. Got way more out
customer_reviews.author: Mia R Canale

customer_reviews.title: doesnt work well
customer_reviews.text: only gets 1-3 black heads each time. makes my nose very dry. sometimes doesn't stick at all
customer_reviews.author: Alexia Melms

customer_reviews.title: New pore strips
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love it got a lot of my imperfections out. Easy to use. Happy I found these affordable and just the same as those name brands; that only give you like 10 or whatever for a crazy price. Buying these from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Ya

customer_reviews.title: Blackheads be gone!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Got so much junk out of my nose.
customer_reviews.author: BriannaLee

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money
customer_reviews.text: A little stiffer than other nose strips, but once you wet your nose and apply it, it feels about the same. Definitely works, getting out all the gunk from your nose. You can't beat the price point at all. You get so many more nose strips than other well known brands for a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Quiroz

customer_reviews.title: beyond compare
customer_reviews.text: It's a great black sticker. Once I put it on my nose, the stuff on my nose almost disappears. It's really great.And the price is very satisfactory, the delivery speed is very fast, packaging is very careful and tight delivery speed is very fast, is really a very pleasant shopping experience
customer_reviews.author: Livi

customer_reviews.title: It's very comfortable. It's recommended
customer_reviews.text: It's a very easy to use product to remove blackheads. It's not very painful to apply it for a while. It won't hurt very much. The whole blackhead comes out. It will be very clean if you use it several times. It's very comfortable. Girls with blackheads strongly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Larry Giroux

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money for a clear nose.
customer_reviews.text: Removes clogged pores well. Only downfall is when applied your nose is left with a glue like residue.... other comparable brands do not do this. I must say it does pull some gross stuff from your nose pores though.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R

customer_reviews.title: Will get a variety
customer_reviews.text: I ordered womans recieved mens black head strips. Great customer service.

customer_reviews.title: They work ok
customer_reviews.text: These are alright but they only got like 2 blackheads out and a whole lots little hairs lol

customer_reviews.title: Work but stink
customer_reviews.text: These work really well. They smell awful however. They have a very strong chemical odor.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are better than my beloved biore strips and cheaper. Glad I found these alternatives!

customer_reviews.title: GET IT
customer_reviews.text: Forgot the biore strips. Get these. The same thing but these come so much more

product_meta.title: Blackhead Pore Strips, Blackhead Remover Deep Cleansing Pore Strips For Nose, 30 strips, Hypo Allergenic and Oil Free
feature_bullets: ✔【BLACKHEADS】We all have them and would like to get rid of them once and for all,there's nothing better than ripping that strip off your nose and seeing a little forest of pore junk.
✔【PORE STRIPS】The Nose strips is a unique method to help extract blackheads while pores will be cleaner and less visible.
✔【CLEAN SKIN】Deep cleansing Pore Strips contain Witch Hazel to help keep your nose skin clear and healthy.
✔【AN ACTUAL CURE】Instantly remove dirt and oil by lifting it out of your facial pores,help to remove blackheads,and tighten pores and prevent future breakouts
✔【100% MONEY BACK GUARANTY】90 days money back guaranty!! No extra requirement. 12 month quality warranty and replace new one.
